wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Boden  (born June 1860) was a Welsh footballer. He was part of the Wales national football team, playing 1 match on 15 March 1880 against England.At club level, he played for Wrexham from 1879–1880. He played as a right wing in the 1879 Welsh Cup Final, where his team lost against Newtown White Star with 1–0.
